context: Hi, I'm looking for a good SciFi movie. I liked Alien (1979) because of its really good use of camera angles and special effects. Back in the day they didn't use computer graphics. Do you know of any good ones?
I saw that one, but I didn't like it, because it was so sad and deeply disturbing violence.
How about Children of the Corn (1984)
Erm, I saw that one too. Way too freaky for me. I thought it was distrubing too.
resp: Yes, they both were disturbing! Would you prefer a comedy romance like Lars and the Real Girl (2007)
